trashday.responses

Class ScheduleResponses

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.responses.ScheduleResponses

  • public class ScheduleResponses
extends Object
    Organizes all the voice responses when talking about the Trash Day Schedule itself.
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin

    • Method Detail

      • respondScheduleMissing

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleMissing(Date requestDate,
                                                                                   TimeZone timeZone)
        Respond when user attempts something that requires a configured schedule, but that schedule doesn't exist, tell them we can't find one and give help on how to add pickups to make a schedule.
        Parameters:
        requestDate - Date State the next pickup(s) after this date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Schedule missing" and how to add with a corresponding Card

      • respondWelcomeToTrashDay

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondWelcomeToTrashDay()

      • respondTimeZoneMissing

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondTimeZoneMissing()

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondSetTimeZoneMissingData(List<String> missingDataFields)

      • respondSetTimeZoneInvalidData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondSetTimeZoneInvalidData(List<String> invalidDataFields)

      • respondUpdatedTimeZone

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondUpdatedTimeZone(TimeZone timeZone)

      • respondScheduleEmpty

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleEmpty(Date requestDate,
                                                                                 TimeZone timeZone)
        Respond when user attempts something that requires a schedule, but that schedule is empty, tell them and give help on how to add pickups to make a schedule.
        Parameters:
        requestDate - Date State the next pickup(s) after this date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        Returns:
        Verbal "Schedule empty" and how to add with a corresponding Card

      • respondScheduleTell

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleTell(com.amazon.speech.speechlet.IntentRequest request,
                                                                                TimeZone timeZone,
                                                                                Schedule schedule)
        Respond when user asks to hear the schedule.
        Parameters:
        request - IntentRequest State the next pickup(s) after this request's date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        schedule - Schedule User's weekly pickup schedule.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card listing the entire weekly pickup schedule.

      • respondScheduleTellNextPickups

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleTellNextPickups(Date requestDate,
                                                                                           TimeZone timeZone,
                                                                                           NextPickups nextPickups,
                                                                                           String pickupName)
        Respond when user asks to hear the next pickup(s).
        Parameters:
        requestDate - Date State the next pickup(s) after this date/time.
        timeZone - TimeZone Time zone for user requests.
        nextPickups - NextPickups mapping pickup names to the next pickup time (after ldtStartingPoint).
        pickupName - String if non-null, state pickup time for only this pickup name. if null, state for all pickups in the schedule.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card listing the next pickup time for each schedule pickup.

      • respondScheduleConfirmedDeleteAll

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleConfirmedDeleteAll(boolean removed)
        Respond when user has confirmed they want to delete entire schedule.
        Parameters:
        removed - boolean True if an existing schedule had to be removed. False if the schedule was already empty.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card stating schedule cleared

      • respondScheduleDeleteAll

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondScheduleDeleteAll()
        Respond with an "Are you sure?" when user requests to delete the entire schedule.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card asking "Are you sure?"

      • respondPickupAddMissingData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddMissingData(List<String> missingDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to add a pickup time to the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        missingDataFields - List which data fields are missing
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule add commands.

      • respondPickupAddInvalidData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddInvalidData(List<String> invalidDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to add a pickup time to the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        invalidDataFields - List which data fields are invalid
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule add commands.

      • respondPickupAddSingle

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupAddSingle(String pickupName,
                                                                                   DayOfWeek dow,
                                                                                   LocalTime tod)
        Respond when user successfully adds a pickup time to the schedule.
        Parameters:
        pickupName - String The pickup added.
        dow - DayOfWeek The pickup day of week.
        tod - TimeOfDay The pickup time of day.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the added pickup.

      • respondPickupDeleteMissingData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteMissingData(List<String> missingDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to delete a pickup time from the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        missingDataFields - List which data fields are missing
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondPickupDeleteInvalidData

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteInvalidData(List<String> invalidDataFields)
        Respond when user tries to delete a pickup time from the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.
        Parameters:
        invalidDataFields - List which data fields are invalid
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondPickupDeleteSingle

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondPickupDeleteSingle(String pickupName,
                                                                                      DayOfWeek dow,
                                                                                      LocalTime tod,
                                                                                      boolean removed)
        Respond when user successfully deletes a pickup time from the schedule.
        Parameters:
        pickupName - String The pickup deleted.
        dow - DayOfWeek The pickup day of week.
        tod - TimeOfDay The pickup time of day.
        removed - boolean True if there was a pickup with this name that got deleted. False if the pickup did not exist at all.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the deleted pickup time.

      • respondEntirePickupDeleteMissingName

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDeleteMissingName()
        Respond when user tries to delete entire pickup from the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was missing and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondEntirePickupDeleteInvalidName

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDeleteInvalidName()
        Respond when user tries to delete an entire pickup from the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name.

        CoberturaIgnore this method since we don't have any rules that would make a pickup name invalid. However, method is written in case we find something in the future.

        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with what data was invalid and help for the schedule delete commands.

      • respondEntirePickupDelete

        public static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse respondEntirePickupDelete(String pickupName,
                                                                                      boolean removed)
        Respond when user successfully deletes an entire pickup from the schedule.
        Parameters:
        pickupName - String The pickup deleted.
        removed - boolean True if there was a pickup with this name that got deleted. False if the pickup did not exist at all.
        Returns:
        Verbal and Card with the deleted pickup.
